Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System - Doxycycline (0.25 - 16 μg/mL)
BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System for use with the antimicrobial agent doxycycline (0.25 - 16 μg/mL) - Gram-positive ID/AST or AST only Phoenix Panels
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Device
Specimen Type(s): Isolates from pure culture of most aerobic and facultative anaerobic Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System with Doxycycline for automated antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Gram-positive isolates
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by MIC of most Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacterial isolates from pure culture, including Staphylococcus, Enterococcus, and Streptococcus, using panels containing doxycycline
